resources.string: An adult should consume 500 grams\nof vegetables and fruits everyday

Jewel robbery case\nA very precious brooch has been stolen! As a detective, your help is needed to find it. The location of the jewelry store is marked on the map. Be ready to resolve an exciting robbery mystery
Natalia: I saw a suspicious man running toward the end of this road and then turning left.\n\n
Bryant: I will tell you if you answer this correctly!\n\n
How much vegetables and fruits should you consume daily?
